name: Bad Magic!
description:
In a Witch's Workshop, you're tasked with developing options for the customers. However, be careful not to mess up, as using the wrong ingredients can cause an unstable potion to explode over you!

WASD to Move, E in Interact, Add Ingredients to the Cauldron using E and Stir the Cauldron using F. Be sure to grab a flask before you collect the potion!

You have one inventory space! Be sure to plan ahead, as the Grand Witch has forbid you from placing anything down, lest it falls off and smashes on the floor. The countertops are notoriously unstable!

Collect ingredients and use various utensils to turn them into potion ingredients.
When you have a potion ingredient, chuck it into the massive cauldron, and when you're ready, stir away to create your potion! 

Once stirred, bottle it up and chuck it into the handy inter-dimensional portal, for a decent profit!
